markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tylosaurus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1239)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Though large in size—sometimes exceeding 40 feet—tylosauruses have sleek bodies and long, narrow snouts. Few creatures compete with them in their environment, as most other aquatic giants reside in deeper water.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Mosasaur_Tylosaurus.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Tylosaurus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1239)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 178</row>

**Perception** +18; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** A tylosaurus can hold its breath for 2 hours

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 137

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, swim 80 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21,
**Damage** 2d12+10 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +19,
**Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning

**Aquatic Drag** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The tylosaurus has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The tylosaurus [Swims](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) up to half its Speed, carrying the grabbed creature with it.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Large, 2d6+5 bludgeoning, Rupture 18

**Vicious Strafe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The tylosaurus Swims up to its Speed. It can make one jaws Strike and one tail Strike at any points during its movement, each attacking a different target.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-249" />
name: Tylosaurus
